title: Mobile Microlearning Teacher Training Course for Integrating Engineering Accessibility

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Engineering Concepts and Experience with Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Program to strengthen accessibility-integrated instructional design competencies in smartphone-based limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners develop the competency to apply accessibility standards (WCAG) for engineering education content in mobile environments with over 80% compliance.
Learners can implement three or more elements—screen reader compatibility, color contrast, and responsive design—when creating simulation and science content.
Learners develop and user-test one or more accessibility-integrated engineering education modules through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
